count tags
zeroing uncounted In the event that count tags remain uncounted for a excessive period of time, you have the ability to enter for these uncounted count tags a quantity of zero ("0"). Entering a non-null value of zero makes it possible to process and post the count tags. To reset the counted values of uncounted count tags to zero, select the Zero Uncounted Count Tags by Site option. The following screen will appear:

mediaobject.caption: Zero Uncounted Count Tags by Site

section.para: When zeroing uncounted count tags by site, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to reset uncounted count tags to zero for all sites.
Specify site where uncounted count tags are to be zeroed.
This is a scrolling text field with word-wrapping for entering comments related to the zeroing process.
